segments.text: Hey , look at the offer I got in my e-mail . It says that I can get rich quickly while working at home !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you also believe in Santa Claus and the Tooth Fairy ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I mean that you're gullible . You shouldn't believe everything you read , especially on the Internet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But it seems like a good idea . All I have to do is first send some money to the person who sent me the letter . After that he'll tell me how to earn much more money .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds like a pyramid scheme . Have you heard of those before ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a scam 7 that's based on a hierarchy , like a pyramid . The person at the top asks the people below him for money , and then tells them to go and ask other people for money while sending some of it back to him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sounds good to me . The guy at the top gets money and so do the people below him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not exactly . The scam keeps on going , with the people at the bottom paying more and more money until they reach the very bottom .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nothing . The people at the bottom give their money to the people above them , and they get nothing . They end up losing . That's why it's a scam .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . I guess I should be more careful about what I read , especially on the Internet where you have no idea who anybody is .
segments.speaker: S1
